title: Customer Due Diligence
description: All regulated fintech entities must implement enhanced Customer Due Diligence (CDD) for users transacting over QAR 10,000 per month.

title: Source of Funds Verification
description: High-risk customers or transactions exceeding QAR 50,000 must have documented source of funds and wealth.

title: KYC Documentation
description: At least two forms of government-issued ID must be verified digitally; proof of residency is required for international users.

title: Transaction Monitoring
description: Automated monitoring system required to detect suspicious activity based on patterns and deviations.

title: Suspicious Transaction Reporting
description: All STRs must be filed with Qatari authorities within 48 hours.

title: Data Residency
description: Customer PII and transactional data of Qatari residents must be stored on servers physically located in Qatar.

title: Data Sharing Consent
description: Explicit, informed consent required for sharing customer data with third-party service providers.

title: Compliance Officer Appointment
description: Designated independent Compliance Officer must be appointed, CV submitted to QCB prior to licensing.

title: Annual Audit Requirement
description: Mandatory annual external audit of technology systems and compliance policies.

title: Capital Requirements - Marketplace Lending
description: Minimum regulatory capital of QAR 7,500,000 must be maintained for P2P lending platforms.
